title: Dissecting the Denominator
text: For a fraction, the expression would be undefined if the denominator was zero. Therefore, set the denominator equal to zero then solve for the variable.
speech: For a fraction, the expression would be undefined if the denominator was zero. Therefore, set the denominator equal to zero then solve for the variable.
pacedSpeech: For a fraction, the expression would be undefined if the denominator was zero. Therefore, set the denominator equal to zero then solve for the variable.

title: Solving a Quadratic Equation
text: Setting the denominator equal to $$0$$ would result in the following equation: $$x^2+5x+6$$ $$=$$ $$0$$. In order to solve this we must factor out the equation.
speech: Setting the denominator equal to  0  would result in the following equation:  x squared, plus 5 x plus 6   is equal to   0 . In order to solve this we must factor out the equation.
pacedSpeech: would result in the following equation:   x squared, plus 5 x plus 6
. In order to solve this we must factor out the equation.

title: Factored Equation
text: The factored form of the equation is $$\left(x+2\right) \left(x+3\right)=0$$.
speech: The factored form of the equation is  parentheses x plus 2,  times, parentheses x plus 3,  is equal to 0 .
pacedSpeech: The factored form of the equation is    x plus 2,  times,  x plus 3,  is equal to 0

title: Solving for the Value
text: What are the value(s) for "x" that make the factored equation true?
speech: What are the value(s) for "x" that make the factored equation true?
pacedSpeech: What are the value(s) for "x" that make the factored equation true?
